name: Jellicent
description: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.effect: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.effect: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
